website_summaries.verdict: No-frills boots for people who need functional footwear.
pros: The boots have a cotton lining that is breathable – this improves the comfort factor to wear them every day
The heel is stacked to ease pressure on the foot
cons: This pair is not glamorous or glossy like other Stuart Weitzman boots
Get this for function, not for fashion

customer_reviews.title: size fits perfectly size down 1/2 when you place an order
customer_reviews.text: Great and seemed authentic. I've been worried that upon some 1 star review about people getting seemly fake items, I have been paying attention to all details such as the graving on the soles, the blue box and the code. It seems like authentic and the leather is soft and comfy. Didn't like the strong plastic smell of the dust bag though to be honest. I heard about a saying that some buyers bought authentic items on Amazon but return the fakes ones!!! OMG!!! That's maybe why the inventory is contaminated! However if things like that happens Amazon should be responsible for the QC!! I think I may be lucky to get a pair of authentic boots! :((
customer_reviews.author: YUHAN SU

customer_reviews.title: Size down a half size!!
customer_reviews.text: I had read many reviews about this boot before purchasing so as to not order the wrong size. I am a true size 11 but after reading about three boots I decided to size down a half size as I would be wearing thin socks with the boot as I am from Southern California and there is no need to thick socks here. If I were to wear these in colder weather I would have definitely ordered a size 11 as thick socks would not work with the 10.5. As far as the boots themselves. They are amazing and I am so happy with them. They are genuine Stewart Weitzman boots, came in purple box with dust bag and all!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and authentic SW!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for these boots for several months; but was reluctant to pay such a high price. When I saw these here at Amazon at a great price, I did not think twice to purchase them and I am glad. I checked the boots with SW agents and confirmed the authenticity of these boots! The boots look great, fit very well and are really comfortable. I haven't worn them in very cold weather, so do not really know if these are really warm.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Very believable knockoff
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for these boots for awhile but couldn’t justify the price tag. I found these at a great price and thought it was too good to be true. It was. The boots came in the purple box and that’s where the authenticity ended. The suede is cheap, the leather interior bends roughly and just by picking them up you can tell how light they are. I know there’s a market for knock offs but the price tag is a bit steep making you think they’re real. There is no way to tell from far away they are fakes, so if you like them, keep them. I was shopping for quality and this was not it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I've been watching and waiting for these boots to go on sale. When they were under $500 I didn't wait any longer. At first I was very disappointed as they arrived in a plain brown box. Petty, I know, but when you pay hundreds of dollars for a pair of boots you expect them to come in the SW purple box! Anyway, I complained to Amazon and they immediately mailed me another pair in the purple box. All is good in boot heaven now. :D. They are beautiful and comfortable. I usually wear a size 8 but got a 7.5 in these and they fit great! Now I'll just have to wait for another sale to get another color.....
customer_reviews.author: anr

customer_reviews.title: These boots are real.
customer_reviews.text: These are real. The price is pretty unbeliable, but they are real. Nordstrom just matched the price as well. Purchased the black suede in 8M. I’m an 8/8.5 but I also visited a Stuart Weitzman location to confirm my size. Boots came with the box, dust bag, etc. everything. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous soft black suede boots over the knee boots!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of Stewart Weitzman 50/50 boots! This time I got them in Black Suede at a huge blowout price! And they are of course authentic! Im good at sewing so I will also add a zipper all the way down on the inner side of the boots so it doesn’t stress out the fabric on the back of the boots when you’re pulling them on . and it’s easier to get in and out of them with a zipper! ( I added a zipper to my first pair) happy with purchase. Almost forgot to mention that the shipper did pack the box with extra care so my Stewart Wiseman box came in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Q.

customer_reviews.title: If you’re on the fence buy them! They are 100% authentic SW 5050 Boots
customer_reviews.text: I have been an amazon shopper for many many years and this is my first review. I felt the need to share that my shoes arrived fast and packed in the Stuart Weitzman purple box, with the dust bag. From reading all the reviews I was skeptical about the authenticity of the boots so I reached out to Stuart Weitzman customer service via email and provided them with photos and the production code number stamped inside the boot. 24 hrs later Stuart Weitzman responded confirming that my boots are 100% authentic SW 5050 Boots. For about $300 w/tax I think I got a hell of a deal. If you’re on the fence just buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya

customer_reviews.title: Authentic!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the shoes are authentic! They come with the original box and everything. They are sooo good. Easy to wear and make me look skinny. For narrow feet, definitely order half size down. But for wide feet, your normal size should work just fine. I’m going to buy another pair. So worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Zhao Li

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Boots, EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I have owned! I'm only 5'1 and they look great on me. Quality is as you would expect from Stuart Weitzman. Fit is as expected. Love these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read great reviews and finally bought the boots
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking about these boots for a couple of years. Read great reviews and finally bought the boots. I was very surprised that the boots are not that great. The quality is good but they do not look that flattering on my feet. I think they are a way too overpriced. I previously had very similar boots by Vince Camoto which were more comfortable and much less expensive. Big disappointment
customer_reviews.author: oksana bull

customer_reviews.title: Returned.....
customer_reviews.text: These came in a plain brown cardboard box. I’ve ordered 5050 boots before and returned them due to the price so I was excited to get these. But I don’t think they’re authentic? They seem thin and plastic like compared to others I’ve purchased. Returned
customer_reviews.author: C. PENN PENN

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I bought these
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought these. I wear a size 12 in sandals and 13 in heels and this fits fine. They look so sleek on. After 6-8 hours, while I have an inch or two in the front for toe room, the heels start burning from rubbing against the back since I wear them without tights or socks. So glad I caught them on sale during the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: My fav boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1/2 size down and it fits well with enough wiggle room. It is snug across the toe box and hugs the ankle and calves like second skin. It takes some effort putting these on initially due to the narrow ankle opening. Goes beautifully with skirts, shorts or leggings but the slim fit makes it a struggle to tug in jeans. The black Nappa leather is soft, light and extremely comfortable. I am 5'8 and it just about covers the top of my knee. Bought this during limited offer sale, still a splurge but definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: webshopper

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I debated these for so long they do cost a lot. I took the plunge after buying cheap leather copies that would constantly bunch around the ankle so I was forever pulling them back up to the knee. Not so with SW boots, the quality materials means they stay put, which is the whole reason you would buy this length boot. It was also a sign of the quality that there was absolutely no discomfort or 'wearing in' period - they fit like a glove from word go. I went down a US half size to 10.5 which is the euro 41, they are roomy but not in an oversized way, just super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Vanas

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I wore my previous pair of Stuart Weitzman 50/50s into the ground. I finally decided I needed to by new ones--and I am so happy to have received these. They are just the same, but newer and shinier--and they cost less, too! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: Timeless Boots - love them!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful! Arrived in the purple Stuart box, as they would from any other store. The leather quality is some of the best I've ever seen. Timeless boots -- can't wait to wear them for years to come. They do stretch, I've had them for a few months now and do notice that there is extra room in the foot although it is not terribly uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shoes and excellent buttery soft leather
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous shoes and excellent buttery soft leather. I get many compliments from people who may or may not know this brand. The only complains I have for these shoes are the fact that they slide downwards throughout the day and create folds near the ankle area. I guess the stretchy back has its plus and minus - I'm not sure if it happens with everyone but I have somewhat muscular calves and this happens to be a lot. I find myself pulling these shoes up every now and then but there's not really a permanent fix.
customer_reviews.author: Shuangchen Shen

customer_reviews.title: 3 tried to get decent pair of boots!
customer_reviews.text: Finally after 3 tries I received a new pair of Weitzman boots that fit. First were half size too large so most people were right to suggest order in half smaller than regular size. But both pair arrived badly packaged. Obvious returns by others. No dust bags. And 2nd pair were a mess and no markings on soles “made in Spain”. So could have been fake. Now have great pair and new unworn boots. Too expensive for anything less.
customer_reviews.author: gaylenrs

customer_reviews.title: Loooooove my boots
customer_reviews.text: I love my boots, the delivery from USA to Australia was incredibly quick and they arrived in the beautiful purple SW box although this was water damaged on the top. The boots are a bit too narrow (for my bunions!) but I will get them stretched at the relevant spots. They look so stylish, I am so happy. I was disappointed there was no SW dust bag in the box but am unsure how to contact Amazon about this.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Michell

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with these fabulous boots!! Quietly sexy.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE these boots!!!!! I have wide feet with bunions from years of poorly fitting shoes. I can walk on these all over NYC! The fact that it is low heeled makes it soooooo sexy. It makes people wonder....hummmm :) Also I have thin ankles and large calves. The fabric on the back makes it fit snugly, perfectly all day long. Putting them on and off is super easy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Coban MTC LCC

customer_reviews.title: Sexy, perfect, authentic
customer_reviews.text: Luxe and simply perfect. Complete with SW box, dust bag. I always wear SW size 8, which I've been lucky to find second hand (I have 6 pair) so these are my splurge. SW shoes are s so well crafted and elegant. They never disappoint. I've just worn my 5050 around he house; planning to venture out into the world tomorrow with my black mini dress.
customer_reviews.author: wennett

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Deal for Luxury
customer_reviews.text: Mine are authentic, new and gorgeous! I purchased from Amazon (not 3rd party), and they arrived in a SW box with dust bag. I have another pair of 5050s and these are the same. I can’t believe I got such an amazing deal! Please note that this style runs large. I typically wear 11 or 11.5 in other boots, but 10.5 in SW 5050s. If you have any doubts, just get them! If you get a lemon, you can return/exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Margot

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Width and it seemed fake at first..
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an 8.5 W and got a 8.5 N. instead. It was in a plain box (the original box may have broke) with no dust bag. I own a pair of 5050's from 4 years ago, and this pair is an 1.25 taller than my original pair. It does have a bar code number and it says Made in Spain, feels like the real deal. Unfortunately it's the wrong width, so back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Jinn Fong

customer_reviews.title: Defective boots, need to exchange
customer_reviews.text: Hi I’ll like to exchange my boots as a defective issue. Please attach the picture. I love the boots and they’re still pretty new . So I need just to exchange it. Thank you hope to have your comprehension.
customer_reviews.author: Hana

customer_reviews.title: They fit significantly worse than the exact same size and style when trying ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fake. They fit significantly worse than the exact same size and style when trying on in reputable stores such as Saks and Neiman Marcus. Also, mine came in a dirty and torn up box. I had them send another pair and the new pair was the exact same. There is also sharpie writing on the sole that says "192" and leather looks worn. Disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: Torri S

customer_reviews.title: second pair with 50% off~so lucky
customer_reviews.text: my second pair of 5050~nice! they can match almost winter-style, the suede feels sooooo soft! I bought the black suede 5050 in 2014 and they are still perfect, and this summer I saw the the navy blue suede were on special offer!50%off!so~
customer_reviews.author: LittleMissQ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect over he knew boot for us shorter folks!
customer_reviews.text: I went a full size down and they fit perfectly. These boots are incredibly comfortable and easy to wear with jeans or leggings. I'm 5'2" and have pretty slim legs and small feet and the stretch around the calf is perfect for me. I'd suggest trying them on in person before committing! I did that at Nordstroms.
customer_reviews.author: SEABCN

customer_reviews.title: THESE BOOTS IS A MUST HAVE FOR EVERY WOMENN IN WORLD--DONT THINK ABOUT JUST BUY IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is OMG!!!!!!! These boots are fab. Ladies save all your lunch money because these boots are idefinitely worth going hungry for....and probably breakfast and dinner (smile) Very comfortable, stylish, and sleek---doesnt even slouch or slip from the clalf. The fit is snug and dam near perfect and goes with everything
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These boots are incredible - a wonderful addition to my wardrobe that I will be able ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are incredible - a wonderful addition to my wardrobe that I will be able to wear for years to come. Now I just have to decide what color to buy next :)
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L.

customer_reviews.title: Authentic SW 5050
customer_reviews.text: I was worried if it is the authentic one or not. I checked with SW customer service and they verified it is authentic. Nice boots
customer_reviews.author: Na

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are amazing. I have a 35" inseam and the leather perfectly cover my knee in the front and the stretch hits perfectly under my knee making it super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: jenny207

customer_reviews.title: Good boots but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 7.5 shoes and this pair of boots in 7.0 fits well. It's a little difficult to put on & take off. The leather is very soft. However I'm returning it because it doesn't look that good on me. I'm 5"3 and 120 lbs. This boots fit tight at my knees. For such a price I expect it to be better. I believe it would look nice on people who have beautiful legs.
customer_reviews.author: Bingjue Li

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots
customer_reviews.text: satisfied! Worm and look fashionable. My shoe size is 4.5 always hard to find a shoes that fits on me perfectly. This is true to size. I ordered 4.5 narrow. It fits right on my shin and feet. I can wear all my winter dress with this boots.
customer_reviews.author: Eun M. Yu

customer_reviews.title: Life is short, buy the boots!
customer_reviews.text: Had been pining for these for years!!!!Saved up my Amazon points, and waited for the (infrequent) markdown....then I pounced and I'm so happy. I got an 8M, I had tried them on at my local store just to be sure, they are a tiny bit bigger than I expected, if I wear them with tights/nylons. With socks/skinny jeans they fit better. I wore them all day, and they are surprisingly comfortable. They look great either tucked into jeans, or with a dress.. Am already plotting my next pair.......
customer_reviews.author: mrchillybeans

customer_reviews.title: I have to give one star because it's the worst bootshopping experience I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have to give one star because it's the worst bootshopping experience I've ever had. It's a $500 boots and it tears at the back when i tried to put it on the SECOND day! Wtf!
customer_reviews.author: Yu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boots to wear all day and the burgundy color is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: First bought the SW Semi boots in the black suede and fell in love with them! Wanted a second pair but thought I would go with the 5050 style. Was thrown off a little at first because they fit a little different than the Semi's but loved the color so much I decided I had to keep them. Well worth it if you want the perfect boot to walk all day in and not have your feet hate you for it. Splurge a little and buy these!!
customer_reviews.author: Whirled

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots but recommend ordering a half size smaller. Run large.
customer_reviews.author: GrayReader

customer_reviews.title: comfy, beautiful but you should  have a 1/2 size smaller than yours
customer_reviews.text: beautiful, easy to put on and very comfortable. it fits a little bigger than regular
customer_reviews.author: Renata

customer_reviews.title: Just click order!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well anticipating i would send these back when they arrived due to the cost... they arrived and i just cant send them back! I mean these are gorgeous!! Hit perfectly above the knee. Super comfortable and so flattering!! Honestly they are worth the $$$$ For me they fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful,sleek boots that will keep your knees warm in winter.
customer_reviews.text: Leather is of high quality, so the surface is very supple and smooth, somewhat resistant to wrinkles. There is also no need to break in. However, due to the softness of the leather, the area above the ankle on the inner side of the leg tends to be bumpy, especially for those who have somewhat pronounced ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Happy socks

customer_reviews.title: I usually do not wear thick socks in winter and these boots are so comfortable that I can even wear them without socks
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a full size smaller than my typical size and it fits just right. I usually do not wear thick socks in winter and these boots are so comfortable that I can even wear them without socks. I am glad that I got the older version of 5050, as the new version feels a bit stiffer and tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: SW boots
customer_reviews.text: Mine came in the Stuart Weitzman box and dust bag, packaged perfectly and brand new. Happy with the great deal ordering on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Genova

customer_reviews.title: No original box
customer_reviews.text: A pair of $600 boots came in a generic brown box. No original box or bags. I bought this pair of boots as a gift. Without the box, I can't be sure of the brand authenticity.
customer_reviews.author: Delia Chang

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: cute but don't really see that they are worth the money. nothing special
customer_reviews.author: psa

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous boots for right legs
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous, much-coveted stylish boots. Unfortunately too big around the leg for my 13" calves and looked "scrunchy" around the leg. Surprisingly, they were also too tall and I am 5'9". Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W.

customer_reviews.title: going back. Very stylish, but too big in ...
customer_reviews.text: going back. Very stylish, but too big in the foot. too expensive
customer_reviews.author: beatrice

customer_reviews.title: I am wearing 7 1/2 and this shoe in 7 1/2 is perfect on me
customer_reviews.text: it is in true size. I am wearing 7 1/2 and this shoe in 7 1/2 is perfect on me. the only complaint i would have it is a little bit narrow for me... i should buy a wide one I guess...
customer_reviews.author: Ice

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots. They fit like gloves, are easy to get on and off, look great and are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... ordered these and they did not come in the nice, deep blue Stuart Weitzman shoe box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and they did not come in the nice, deep blue Stuart Weitzman shoe box, but instead arrived in a plain brown box with no shipping label. I thought it was odd. Were these knock-offs? The shoes seemed like the real thing and had Stuart Weitzman soles and "made in Spain" on the bottom, but for the price I'd like to have been sure that they weren't a cheaper version of the 50/50 boot. They were a little loose and saggy in the ankles so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Z

customer_reviews.title: My wife freaked - she loves them.
customer_reviews.text: This boot is a classic. Gorgeous leather that hugs your leg with the 50/50 structure. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: HEATH

customer_reviews.title: Fake brand shoes
customer_reviews.text: Zero star. They sell fake brand. I can’t believe it. It looks like from SW, but it is a fake boots made in China
customer_reviews.author: Freshsalad

customer_reviews.title: For undesired mistakes
customer_reviews.text: The boot is cozy and stylish, but Amazon sent me 1 size larger. The shoes box says it's 5.5 M, while trying the shoes out I found it runs much bigger than the usual 5.5, and I checked the inside shoes, seeing there printed 6 1/2 M... Frustrated to get this happen again...
customer_reviews.author: yubi

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous boots
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase - these ar beautiful boots
customer_reviews.author: Bill's Wife

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Stewart Weitzman boots don’t disappoint. Well made and comfortable they are worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great fit, runs a little large
customer_reviews.text: I've heard so many great things about SW 5050. When I first got them, they were perfect. The suede is very soft, and they make my legs look so skinny. After wearing them for three days and they got loosen a little bit, I felt these boots run a little bit large. Wish I ordered them half size down. Aside from this, they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Di

customer_reviews.title: classic
customer_reviews.text: I have these in black nappa and black suede and wanted the blue to wear with tights and short tunic style dresses. Beautiful soft suede and great quality. Very cormfortable to wear and flattering to the leg
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Fong

customer_reviews.title: Totally screwed up the order. Wrong size and color!
customer_reviews.text: Wrong size, wrong color, not in the original shoe box.
customer_reviews.author: Feng Wang

customer_reviews.title: You only live once
customer_reviews.text: These boots are worth the price and fit like a glove. Ive never spent this much on boots before and wont have to cause these bad boys are gonna last for many years. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Doesn't matter

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great and comfortable boot. Looks hot on!!! It is definitely an investment but it will last a long time or at least I sure hope so.
customer_reviews.author: Aghe

customer_reviews.title: great stylish boots!
customer_reviews.text: head that they do not look great on petite girl, I'm 157cm and the height is just above the knees while not at all fold around ankles. besides, help my legs to look slim~
customer_reviews.author: HarimaHario

customer_reviews.title: I love my SW 50/50 boots
customer_reviews.text: I love my SW 50/50 boots! I ordered my normal size 7 and they fit perfect. I ordered the black leather boots. Super comfortable, sleek, sexy and classy boots. I highly recommend. I received by boots within 3 days. Thanks amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: ShoegurlNYC

customer_reviews.title: These boots run VERY small
customer_reviews.text: These will only fit those women with very narrow calves. I am 5'6 and 125 lbs with average sized calves - while these fit with tights I could barely get them on with skinny jeans and they pressed uncomfortably into my calves - I had to take them off right away. What a disappointment because they are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: G Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Best boots ever, Amazon delivers with fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! My normal size is an 8, but I had to go down to 7.5 in these. Great quality, fast shipping, even got these at a discount with Amazon from the MSRP of $655.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is a lovely shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. Based on the previous review, I order it half size down. Very comfortable for walk. The lambskin is very soft. I am already thinking about have a Stuart Weitzman lowland as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Famous but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love them, but too baggy around ankle, so had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: emma z

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots and they fit my calves instead of being sloppy like most boots are.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Genz

customer_reviews.title: I am SO GLAD that I did not size down as so many ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous color. I would call it a dark Navy Blue. I am SO GLAD that I did not size down as so many other reviews suggested. I find that they fit TRUE TO SIZE. I wear a 7.5 in almost everything and if I had ordered a 7 I would have ended up with a tight fitting boot especially with socks on. They are tighter in my calves than the lowlands which is another reason that you should ORDER YOUR CORRECT SIZE. I do not have big calves either....quite slim actually. Very attractive fit. (I also have the Black leather SW 5050 boots and I needed the 7.5 in that as well.
customer_reviews.author: PurseLover

customer_reviews.title: they run large
customer_reviews.text: i ordered 1/2 size up thinking with thick sock I would need the room. the shoe runs large. If i had not already worn them I would have swapped for a smaller size. Other than that I really love them they are beautiful and very well made. i will put in an insert or figure out someway to make them work because I do love them.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Bashinski

customer_reviews.title: love Stuart Weitzman
customer_reviews.text: love these boots wanted them for a long period of time. It fits so perfect.
customer_reviews.author: rntbrooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit well as I hoped as my old pair ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit well as I hoped as my old pair; especially it is very hard to take them off! Moreover,It looks bulky at my ankles, sadly, I have to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: snowflake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every girl should have a pair of 5050. I got compliments every time when I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Snow

customer_reviews.title: SW Boots 50/50
customer_reviews.text: Love them, love them, love them. Beautiful boots, exceptionally made. My friends comment on them all the time. I love it that they are jealous. Smokin boots.
customer_reviews.author: KatPod

customer_reviews.title: Stuart Weitzman 5050 boot
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots !!! I was afraid the over the knee look would be too much, but they look classic and sleek with leggings and skinny jeans. I wear a size 9 and the fit is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: brenna dubois

customer_reviews.title: ... a little bit big and the shoes smell very bad, stinky smell
customer_reviews.text: The size is a little bit big and the shoes smell very bad, stinky smell.
customer_reviews.author: Ya Hui Hung

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent craftsmanship, so comfy I can wear them all day
customer_reviews.author: Frida K..

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly and match any leggings or jeans. Just the boot I want. But a little too expensive. Still, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Just hard to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Just hard to put on and take off. But so beautiful make your leg so thin and long.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Fabulosity
customer_reviews.text: Love these fabulous boots! Look great dressed up or down and fit my skinny legs!
customer_reviews.author: P P Grace

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortably as expected
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect Import Fees Deposit is so expensive. It somehow degrades my experience. Not as comfortably as expected. I cannot well too long, or it would make my feet hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Yan Jin Ru

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Totally love these boots. Comfy, cool and as expected from SW. Ver happy with my purchase thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: james d

customer_reviews.title: Purchased over a year ago in gray and I still love them!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these when they were on sale for less than $300. I wear a size US11M and they fit true to size. They go well with skinny pants and mini skirts. They are elegant and comfortable. Generally I think they are made for taller women. I would never recommend these for someone under 5'9". I am almost 6' and the length is perfect. The quality is great. I really like this brand ;-))
customer_reviews.author: Sabeth

customer_reviews.title: These are comfortable and are very stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and are very stylish. If you have narrow legs, only buy this brand!! Expensive, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: but I find it fits very good! I love it
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that it would be too narrow for me coz it looked so, but I find it fits very good! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Fangrong

customer_reviews.title: uncomfortable around the ankles
customer_reviews.text: Quite fit but a bit too tight around the ankles, the leather feels really smooth all over for one boot however a bit rough over the knee area on the other boot. Overall great packaging and prompt delivery service.
customer_reviews.author: Yi Ruo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect! comes with SW box and everything fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rich midnight blue
customer_reviews.text: This boots are simply beautiful. I don’t want to take them off. The blue is more of a rich midnight blue which I love. They are very comfortable. I wear a size 12m and they are a little big but not sure if the 11.5 would work. So they are a keeper. I’m 5”9 and they just cover my knee. They arrived in the purple box. They are stamped on the inside in other words they are the real deal and they decrease while I had them in my cart. Gotta love Amazon! Loving my 5050 boots. Happy cold weather to me!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn381

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, My 4 th pair!! When you have thin calfs-this boots are for you!!! Thousands of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Takkas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: What great boots! I can't wait for the weather to cool off so that I can wear them. Very comfortable and look great with leggings, skinny jeans and skirts.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: and looks very nice. the leather is very soft and smooth
customer_reviews.text: this boot fit my feet and leg quite well, and looks very nice. the leather is very soft and smooth, which makes the wearing quite easy. very good
customer_reviews.author: Ming

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best boot I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best boot I've ever had...stuart weitzman all the way! Snagged the last narrow 5.5 nappa leather 5050. The boot hugs your calves and is so comfortable. I will be getting the lowland next year.
customer_reviews.author: Gyu Young Song

customer_reviews.title: I love the color!
customer_reviews.text: I book a 8.5 and they fit well.They are 1 size larger comparing with my other shoes. I am 5.74 feet height and the boots can be just over my knees. Looks not as long as in the bloggers‘ photos. But I like the color so much. The color deserves 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: WANG Yinglian

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and fit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and fit; perfect hight of the heel. I usually wear US 9(Euro 39), C/D width of shoes; however, these boots are somewhat larger than I expected. I will change to 8.5 C/D next time.
customer_reviews.author: Shih Chun Chang

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. Suede is beautiful and they fit nicely except they are too short and don't go over my knee! So bummed but had to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Christen Connell

customer_reviews.title: love these boots
customer_reviews.text: They are stylish and comfortable. Some days I'm running around 18 hours and DON'T have it as my first instinct to take them off when I get home. I've worm them for work, to go out, go riding. Clean up easy, if I could find them at the same price in different color I would get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: masha

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and fashion
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat large. I usually wear 6.5 US sizing, I'll order a size 6 if I buy another pair in the future. The boots are soft and light, easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: He Huan

customer_reviews.title: it is also perfect fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 8 normally, but I got 8.5 this time, it is also perfect fit and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: there is nothing bad I can say
customer_reviews.text: I mean, there is nothing bad I can say. Love the height. very comfortable and versatile for dressing up or casual.
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: I got my black stude boots this moring which is as expected.i can't wait to open the purple box to try the lovely boots on and unsurprised me that they are perfectly fit and so nice on! You won't regret for getting them!worth for every cent!ps:no dust bag ~but everything else is fine:)
customer_reviews.author: Qianjun Chen

customer_reviews.title: Gives any outfit a touch of class
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I bought them in a 9,5 even though I am normally a 10. The fit is superb, the colour goes with anything from black tights to jeans. The day they arrived I put them on and wore them for hours that is how comfortable they are. Note, as they are suded and thus prone to staining I would waterproof them first to minimise scuffing. These boots turn alot of heads, simple in design yet elegant on the leg. Well made, Highly recommended. I waited for the sales to be able to afford them. They are well worth thr price as they never date I will be able to wear them for many seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Makris

product_meta.title: Stuart Weitzman Women's 5050 Over-the-Knee Boot
product_meta.description:
Over-the-knee boot. The iconic 5050 boots are instantly recognizable; note the distinctive just-over-the-knee front shaft, crafted from ultra-luxe nappa or suede, and the slightly shorter micro stretch back shaft — a SW signature detail meticulously engineered for a sleek silhouette and a flawless fit. Wear these A-lister wardrobe essentials with dresses or skinny jeans. Insole: Leather

Stuart Weitzman's 5050 is both classic and contemporary. The look is top-notch, and, with a slender cut and an elasticized fabric panel at the back, it allows an ultra-slim fit. The low heel makes it great for all-day wear. What more could you possible want from a boot?

Stuart Weitzman has built a reputation for its creative use of unique materials in footwear and accessories and for its attention to quality. Stuart Weitzman has earned accolades from both the design world and legions of diverse fans, including some of the top celebrities across the globe. His shoes and accessories are a familiar sight at events like the Oscars and the Emmys.

See more
feature_bullets: Over-the-knee boot with low heel and stretchy contrast back panel
